answers.answer: Are you on insulin? I ask because your levels [assuming they are mmol/l] are dangerously high. Please see your doctor for he/she will need to adjust your medication and/or start your on an insulin program.

question: Hi, I have diabetes for 2 years, the average of my level is over 10, sometimes around 15.9 and 17.  I already take medicine and control my eating, still couldn't make it lower, am I need to double the medicine, any advice would be highly appreciated.clara123
title: diabetes level always 15.9 and 17
